alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 18 at 3:28PM EDT until June 18 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Eastern Coffee County in southeastern Alabama... Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Houston County in southeastern Alabama... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... North central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida... Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 227 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ariton to near Hartford to 9 miles northeast of De Funiak Springs, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Daleville, Abbeville, Cottonwood, Bonifay, Geneva, Marianna, Headland, Dothan, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Enterprise, Chipley, Graceville, Hartford, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Level Plains and Slocomb. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
